title: PBE Help ME!
body:
https://pbesignup.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/pbe-signup - I want to play PBE but everytime i click on "I Want To Help!" it says this "Something went wrong
Was Ziggs here? Something...blew up on this page. Please give it another shot later." SOMEONE HELP ME PLEASE!

replies.body:
Hey there,

PBE signup is currently unavailable for OCE accounts.

You'd need to create an NA, EUW or EUNE account and level that to be eligible for PBE access.
